price: Allah’tan mağfiret dile. Şüphesiz Allah, çokça bağışlayan ve merhamet edendir.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'taghfiri al-laha inna al-laha kāna ghafūran raḥīman
